titleStmt.title: An elegy to the memory of the Right Houorable [sic] Thomas Earl of Ossory, who depated [sic] this life, July the 30th. 1680.
titleStmt.author: True lover of his vertues.

notesStmt.note: Signed: By a true lover of his vertues.
Verse: "Let no man our officious hast condemn ..."
Item at A4:1[109] imperfect: cropped, affecting title.
